issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Trying to run any app on Android emulator results in the following output: http://pastie.org/2601184

Apps being compiled range from new project with no new content, kitchenSink and older projects that have already been built for iOS. 

The following solutions have been tested:
- Perform clean Builds
- Ti Mobile SDK was moved from /Library/Application Support/... to User/Library/ App....
- Updated JDK was installed.
fields.summary: ERROR when running any app on Android Emulator on Lion OSX
fields.environment: Lion OSX, Ti Studio (up to date), SDK 1.7.2,  Android 2.3

comments.body:
I am sorry that it has taken this long to get to your ticket. The issue you describe may be related to an old version, as we have not had reports of it from other users since.

If you are still experiencing it, please reopen this ticket.

Thanks for your efforts.
